module.p: a-staigh [at] inside is is an inessive adverb of location (contrasting with both the illative a-steach [to] inside and the adverb a-muigh [at] outside).

section.p:
Some examples –
a-staigh gu into
older pedagogical examples –
Bha an latha brèagha blàth is thug an athair leis Iain agus Anna anns a’ chàr. Chaidh iad sìos taobh an locha is stad iad aig àite bòidheach gorm. Chuir iad an càr a stigh gu taobh an rathaid is thug iad brat a mach as a’ chàr air son suidhe air. [...]
The day was lovely and warm and their father took John and Ann in the car. They went down the side of the lake and they stopped at a beautiful green place. They put the car into the side of the road and they took a blanket out of the car for sitting on. [...] td. 6
